caption.p: Location and elevation of Rhodiola distributions within the Qinghai-Tibetan Plateau (QTP) and the Hengduan Mountains (HM). Elevation data were downloaded from WorldClim Dataset ( www.worldclim.org/bioclim). The map was processed by ArcGIS ver 10.2 (ESRI, Redlands, California, USA) ( http://www.esri.com/).
